pinyin: děng xià cái pāi ， kuài diǎn qù shuā yá
english: I won’t take the picture until later. Hurry up and brush your teeth.

text: 歡迎來到Z頻道的大馬番薯日記
pinyin: huān yíng lái dào Z pín dào de dà mǎ fān shǔ rì jì
english: Welcome to Channel Z’s Malaysian Sweet Potato Diary

pinyin: yě jiù shì xiǎo xué de
pāi qù yún dǐng de yǐng piàn
guò hòu yào pāi zhǎng zhǎng de
english: I’m going to take a long photo later

pinyin: mǎn zú yī xià tā de yù wàng ba
